ma2k.name: Player
option: Ask about the papers he's reading

ma2k.name: MA2K
ma2k.text: The papers? W-Wha OH you mean the this? Yes, theres grammatical corrections on the pages, and some side notes. However, I’m still not sure what it is.

ma2k.name: Player
option: It could be important to somebody.

ma2k.name: Player
ma2k.text: I think it's part of a

ma2k.name: MA2K
ma2k.text: W-what? OH it might be... So what are you up to now?

ma2k.name: Player
option: Finishing my to do list and meeting the nurse.

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: Hee-hee, do you wanna play cards?

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: Hee-hee very fun. So, do you know any 3 player games?

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: Of course you, it’s not like theres anyone else here. Hee-hee.

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: I wonder which one said that. Hee-hee.

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: Oh? alright then, I guess its just the two us then, hee-hee.

5ammy.name: 5AMMY
5ammy.text: -Gulp- Thank you. The food tastes so good that I ended up coughing.

5ammy.name: 5AMMY
5ammy.text: -he puts down his utensils- You want to chat? Okay then.

5ammy.name: Player
option: Why is it so dark in here?

option: Oh righty, give him his water

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Talks about orwell george. Did you know that was his pen name? Mmm... His name.. Now what was his real name again..

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Mmm... Yes.. Yes thats right.. Mr Eris Arthur Blair.

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Mmm... Thats not common knowledge... How do you know that?

ow3n.name: Player
option: I read it in a book?

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Mmm... Oh silly me... you were the on who studied him wasn't it? Mmm...

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Master? Master of words? No.. no thats not it.

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Mmm... Master of arts, i think it was?...

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Mmm... Yes, yes i think i remember making fun of you for it. Mhm... not a real job.

ow3n.name: OW3n
ow3n.text: Congratulations on the book release by the way. Mhm... I really like reading...
